Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is considered as a potential candidate for clean and efficient alternate energy source.
Titulo: Structural, Thermal, and Electrical Study of Bi0.5Sr0.5MnO3

Sentencas: Efforts are being made to reduce their operating temperature for SOFCs commercialization.
Titulo: Structural, Thermal, and Electrical Study of Bi0.5Sr0.5MnO3

Sentencas: However, the reduction in operating temperature increases the polarization effect in the existing cathodes.
Titulo: Structural, Thermal, and Electrical Study of Bi0.5Sr0.5MnO3

Sentencas: In the present study, Bi0.5Sr0.5MnO3 was synthesized and studied for its structural, thermal, and electrical properties.
Titulo: Structural, Thermal, and Electrical Study of Bi0.5Sr0.5MnO3

Sentencas: Bi0.5Sr0.5MnO3 was synthesized by conventional solid state reaction method.
Titulo: Structural, Thermal, and Electrical Study of Bi0.5Sr0.5MnO3

Sentencas: The as-prepared sample was characterized by x-ray diffraction, scanning electron microscope, thermogravimetric analysis, dilatometer and impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Structural, Thermal, and Electrical Study of Bi0.5Sr0.5MnO3

Sentencas: The Rietveld refinement results confirm that Bi0.50Sr0.50MnO3 shows the tetragonal symmetry with p4mm space group.
Titulo: Structural, Thermal, and Electrical Study of Bi0.5Sr0.5MnO3

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy study shows that the distribution of grains is uniform and the grains are well connected to each other due to better sinterability of the samples.
Titulo: Structural, Thermal, and Electrical Study of Bi0.5Sr0.5MnO3

Sentencas: The dilatometric curve shows linear behavior up to 600 degrees C and after that becomes steeper.
Titulo: Structural, Thermal, and Electrical Study of Bi0.5Sr0.5MnO3

Sentencas: This can be due to the loss of lattice oxygen at higher temperatures and creation of oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Structural, Thermal, and Electrical Study of Bi0.5Sr0.5MnO3

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient of the system is similar to 8.9x10(-6)
Titulo: Structural, Thermal, and Electrical Study of Bi0.5Sr0.5MnO3
